en_text: 3x ATK and 1.5x HP if [2746] is on the team

jp_skill.name: 獄幻魔の呪縛
jp_skill.raw_description: チームに隻眼の獄幻魔・ズオーがいると HPが1.5倍、攻撃力は3倍。

kr_skill.name: 옥환마의 주박
kr_skill.raw_description: 팀 내에 척안의 옥환마 즈오가 있으면 HP가 1.5배 공격력은 3배

na_skill.name: Hell Phantom Demon's Curse
na_skill.raw_description: 3x ATK & 1.5x HP with One-Eyed Hell Phantom Demon, Zuoh on your team
